name: YAWoFFA
description:
A small word puzzle for Commodore Amiga which is played much the same way as other Wheel of Fortune games. Spin wheel, choose letters and solve words/sentences.

You can also make your own puzzles. Just fill a textfile with questions and compress it with the pack program included on the disk. You can play your own puzzle by typing: yawoffa yourpuzzle.pak

Read the included readme text for more information.

Note: If you create a puzzle file you can send it to me and I can include it on the disk.

-- Features --

  • Play as a single player or hot seat for up to 4 players.
  • 8 puzzle categories
  • Easily make your own puzzles.

-- Credits--

Code & art by zooperdan
Music by Maze/dSr

-- Requirements --

Requires Kickstart 2.x and 1mb chip ram (or greater).

-- Future plans --

  • German version
  • CPU players
  • More puzzle categories

-- Change log --

  • Version 0.5 - 20.10.2021
    - Added four new categories
            - Popular Amiga games
            - Funny porn titles
            - Brands
            - Food and Drinks
  • Version 0.4 - 18.10.2021
    - Initial release
